block.p: Amanda Maria Southon, the daughter of Priscilla J. Southon of Manhattan and the late Michael D. Southon, was married yesterday to Brett Hudson Miller, the son of Marcia E. Miller of Manhattan and Samuel H. Miller of Bloomington, Ind. The Rev. Vernon C. Nichols, a Unitarian Universalist minister, performed the ceremony at the Friends Meeting House in Manhattan.

Mrs. Miller, 34, is the manager for executive recruiting of Gap Inc., the clothing retailer, in San Bruno, Calif. She graduated from Smith College. Her mother is the vice president for human resources of the New York Public Library.

Miller of Manhattan and Samuel H. Miller of Bloomington, Ind. The Rev. Vernon C. Nichols, a Unitarian Universalist minister, performed the ceremony at the Friends Meeting House in Manhattan.

Mrs. Miller, 34, is the manager for executive recruiting of Gap Inc., the clothing retailer, in San Bruno, Calif. She graduated from Smith College. Her mother is the vice president for human resources of the New York Public Library.

Mr. Miller, 35, is an account director in San Francisco for Modem Media, an e-commerce consulting company. He graduated from Indiana University and received an M.B.A. from the University of Pennsylvania. His mother is the associate publisher of Martha Stewart Weddings, a magazine in Manhattan. His father retired as the executive vice president for operations and chief pilot of Pan American Airlines at Kennedy Airport in Queens.
